channel.title: Released a hand-curated newsletter for founder's stories, books and more!
channel.description:
Hey Lenny here! I've recently launched a new newsletter for hand-curated founders stories, startup books, podcast interviews, videos, and many more. Now you don't have an excuse to always be learning!
I know discovering good content is hard and time consuming, so I took some time to curate and put it together.
Highly appreciate it if y'all can subscribe and share. Here is the link - inspireops (dot) com

inspireops
